events.message: Hello, I received my order yesterday but I want to request a refund because the item is not what I expected.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding dissatisfaction with the product.
Assigning this case to our refunds specialist team for further assistance and processing.
Hi! Thank you for contacting us about your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request so we can proceed accordingly?
The order number is 123456789. I was expecting a different color and the product looks quite different from the pictures.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund once you return the item. I will send you a prepaid return shipping label shortly.
Thanks, that sounds good. I will ship the product back as soon as I get the label.
The return shipping label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your refund.
Since there has been no further communication and we hope your refund was processed successfully, we are closing this case. Thank you!
